Begin by writing a loop that iterates over the hidden messages defined in `instructions`.
`for message in instructions { ... }`
For each message, call `tinker.identifyLanguage(text:)` to identify in which language the message was written.

`tinker.identifyLanguage(text:)` returns a list of languages and Watson's confidence that the text was actually written in that language. Use the `highestConfidenceLanguage` property to quickly pick out the language with the highest confidence.
Once you know the langugage in which a message was written, call `tinker.translate(text:sourceLanguage:targetLanguage:)` to translate the message to `.english`.
Not seeing the results you expect? Make sure you have entered your Watson service credentials correctly!
